24b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam skye mched drug gi
24b4('bum): 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
24b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam reg pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
24b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
24b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sred pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
25a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam len pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma
25a2('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
25a3('bum): nam srid pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
25a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam skye ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
25a5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rga shi'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
25a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma
25a7('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
25b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
25b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
25b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag
25b4('bum): par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
25b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
25b6('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
25b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib
26a1('bum): pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
26a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
26a3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi
26a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/

26a6('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba yongs su rdzogs par
26b1('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
26b2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
26b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
26b4('bum): 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
26b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
26b6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
26b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma
27a1('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
27a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub
27a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rang gi mtshan nyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
27a4('bum): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
27a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib
27a6('bum): pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
27a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
27b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
27b2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/
27b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yang dag par spong ba
27b4('bum): rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
27b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
27b6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
27b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba
28a1('bum): de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
28a2('bum): tshe/ nam byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
28a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
28a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba
28a5('bum): de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
28a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
28a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tshad pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs
28b1('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
28b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par thar pa brgyad
28b3('bum): kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
28b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
28b5('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma
28b6('bum): mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
28b7('bum): nam mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
29a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
29a2('bum): pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
29a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
29a4('bum): bcu'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
29a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
29a6('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
29a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba
29b1('bum): de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sangs rgyas kyi chos
29b2('bum): ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
29b4('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
29b5('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa
29b6('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
29b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / 'das shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / ma 'ongs shes bya bar yang dag
30a1('bum): par rjes su mthong / da ltar byung zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / dge zhes bya ba dang / dge zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / lung du ston ces bya ba dang lung du ston ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
30a2('bum): mthong / 'dus byas shes bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / 'dod pa'i khams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / gzugs
30a3('bum): pa'i khams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
30a4('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag bar rjes su mthong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar
30a5('bum): yang dag par rjes su mthong / nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
30a6('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
30a7('bum): mthong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
30b1('bum): dor ba pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar
30b2('bum): yang dag par rjes su mthong / pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / dngos po pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
30b3('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / rdzu
30b4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / dbang po rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / stobs rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya bar yang dag
30b5('bum): par rjes su mthong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / bsam gtan rnams shes bya bar yang dag par
30b6('bum): rjes su mthong / tshad pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
30b7('bum): mthong / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / mngon bar
31a1('bum): shes pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / ting nge 'dzin rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
31a2('bum): bcu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / snying rje chen po zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
31a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / rnam pa thams cad
31a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos rnams
31a5('bum): kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid dang phyir mi ldog pa dang / gsog dang / gso ba dang / snying po pa dang / dbang du gyur pa dang / byed pa pa dang / srog pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// bcom ldan
31a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// tshor ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// 'du shes bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/
31a7('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// 'du byed bas ma gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/
31b1('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rna ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// sna bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// lce bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to//
31b2('bum): lus bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// yid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// gzugs bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// sgra bsam
31b3('bum): gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// dri bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// ro bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// reg bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/
31b4('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// chos bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam
31b5('bum): gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan
31b6('bum): to/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab
31b7('bum): pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// lce'i
32a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab
32a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis
32a3('bum): khyab pa bstan to/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// lus kyi 'dus
32a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab par bstan to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// sa'i khams bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/
32a5('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// chu'i khams bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// khams bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rlung gi khams bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam
32a6('bum): gyis khyab pa bstan to/ / nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// ma rig pa bsam gyis
32a7('bum): khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// 'du byed bas ma gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// dang gzugs bsam gyis khyab
32b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// skye mched drug bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// reg bya bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// tshor ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/
32b2('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// sred pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to/ len pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// srid pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to//
32b3('bum): skyes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rga shi bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// tshul khrims kyi
32b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir//
32b5('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// nang
32b6('bum): stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to//
32b7('bum): stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis
33a1('bum): khyab pa bstan to/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// mtha' las 'das
33a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// dor ba pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam
33a3('bum): gyis khyab pa bstan to/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam
33a4('bum): gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// dngos po pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to//
33a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/
33a6('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// yang dag par spong ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// dbang po bsam gyis
33a7('bum): khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// stobs bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// byang chub kyi yan lag bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// 'phags pa'i lam
33b1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// 'phags pa'i bden pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// bsam gtan bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to//
33b2('bum): tshad pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/
33b3('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bsam gyis
33b4('bum): khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// mngon par shes pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// gzungs kyi sgo bsam
33b5('bum): gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab
33b6('bum): pa bstan to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// snying rje chen po bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad
33b7('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// thams cad shes pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa
34a1('bum): bstan to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa bstan to// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa//
34a2('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
34a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor ba bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
34a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du shes bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
34a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
34a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
34a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
34b1('bum): gal te rna ba bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna bsam gyis
34b2('bum): khyab ces bya bar 'du shes ba na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du
34b3('bum): shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa
34b4('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
34b5('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
34b6('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sgra bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
34b7('bum): par byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dri bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
35a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ro bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub
35a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
35a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
35a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems
35a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems
35a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
35a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi ba na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub

35b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'

36b6('bum): bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam

37a2('bum): 'du byed bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes

37a7('bum): ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sred pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du

37b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te srid pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su

38a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

38b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

38b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

39b7('bum): rnams bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i
40a1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
40a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
40a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshad pa rnams bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
40a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
40a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub
40a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
40b1('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/
40b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab
40b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha
40b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/
40b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/
40b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/
40b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes
41a1('bum): pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te snying rje chen po bsam gyis
41a2('bum): khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
41a3('bum): pa brgyad bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

41a5('bum): tshe/ gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
41a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shis pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
41a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa/ sangs
41b1('bum): rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
41b2('bum): po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la
41b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs su rtog rnam par rtog go/ gzugs kyi mtshan mar rtog rnam par rtog go/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par
41b4('bum): rtog go/ tshor bar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ tshor ba'i mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// tshor ba'i rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ 'du shes su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ 'du shes kyi mtshan mar

45b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar
45b7('bum): rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par
46a1('bum): rtog go/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ ngo bo
46a2('bum): nyid stong pha nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go// dngos po
46a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog go/ rnam par rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// dran pa nye bar
46a4('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
46a5('bum): kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
46a6('bum): du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ dbang po rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go// stobs rnams su rtog/
46a7('bum): rnam ra rtog go/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
46b1('bum): kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
46b2('bum): mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan mar
46b3('bum): rtog/ rnam par rtog go// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ bsam
46b4('bum): gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ tshad pa rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ tshad pa rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// tshad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par
46b5('bum): rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
46b6('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rnam par thar pa brgyad du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam
46b7('bum): par rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur rtog/ rnam par rtog go// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
47a1('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon par par rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
47a2('bum): mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i rang bzhin du du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ mngon par shes ba rnams su
47a3('bum): rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin
47a4('bum): rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams su rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog
47a5('bum): go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs
47a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ 'jigs pa bzhir rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ 'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ 'jigs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin du rtog rnam par rtog go// so so yang
47a7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhir rtog rnam par rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ snying rje chen por rtog/
47b1('bum): rnam par rtog go/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
47b2('bum): 'dres pa brgyad kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi
47b3('bum): mtshan mar rtog rnam par rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du rtog/ rnam par rtog go// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan mar rtog rnam par rtog go/
47b4('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad
47b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtog/ rnam par rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs bsam gyis khyab bo// tshor ba bsam gyis khyab bo// 'du shes bsam gyis khyab bo// 'du byed bas ma gyis
47b6('bum): khyab bo/ / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab bo// bsam gyis khyab bo// rna ba bsam gyis khyab bo// sna bsam gyis khyab bo// lce bsam gyis khyab bo// lus bsam gyis khyab bo// yid bsam gyis khyab bo// gzugs
47b7('bum): bsam gyis khyab bo/ / sgra bsam gyis khyab bo// dri bsam gyis khyab bo// ro bsam gyis khyab bo// reg bsam gyis khyab bo// chos bsam gyis khyab bo// gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab bo// rna ba'i rnam par
48a1('bum): shes pa bsam gyis khyab bo/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab bo// lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab bo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab bo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis
48a2('bum): khyab bo/ / gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab bo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab bo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab bo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab bo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam
48a3('bum): gyis khyab bo/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis khyab bo// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab po// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab bo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
48a4('bum): ba bsam gyis khyab bo/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab bo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab bo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis khyab bo// sa'i
48a5('bum): khams bsam gyis khyab bo/ / chu'i khams bsam gyis khyab bo// khams bsam gyis khyab bo// rlung gi khams bsam gyis khyab bo// nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis khyab bo// rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam
48a6('bum): gyis khyab bo/ / ma rig pa bsam gyis khyab bo// 'du byed bsam gyis khyab bo// rnam par shes pa bsam gyis khyab bo// dang gzugs bsam gyis khyab bo// skye mched drug bsam gyis khyab bo// reg pa bsam
48a7('bum): gyis khyab bo/ / tshor ba bsam gyis khyab bo// sred pa bsam gyis khyab bo// len pa bsam gyis khyab bo// sred pa bsam gyis khyab bo// skye ba bsam gyis khyab bo// rga shi bsam gyis khyab bo// sbyin pa'i pha rol
48b1('bum): tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab bo/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab bo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab bo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab bo// bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa
48b2('bum): bsam gyis khyab bo/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis khyab bo// nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyas khyab bo// phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
48b3('bum): bsam gyis khyab bo/ / chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// mtha' las
48b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// dor ba pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// chos thams cad stong
48b5('bum): pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// dngos po pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis
48b6('bum): khyab bo/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis
48b7('bum): khyab bo/ / dngos po rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// stobs rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis khyab bo// 'phags pa'i
49a1('bum): bden pa rnams bsam gyis khyab bo/ / bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// tshad pa rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// rnam par thar pa
49a2('bum): brgyad bsam gyis khyab bo/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis khyab bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bsam gyis khyab bo// mngon par shes pa rnams bsam
49a3('bum): gyis khyab bo/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis khyab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis khyab bo// 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis khyab bo// so so yang dag par
49a4('bum): rig pa bzhi bsam gyis khyab bo/ / snying rje chen po bsam gyis khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad bsam gyis khyab bo// thams cad shes pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo/
49a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis khyab bo// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i
49a6('bum): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin no/ / // shes rab kyi pha tu phyin da pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa// rab 'byor kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
49a7('bum): tu phyin da pa ni zab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' pa/ rab gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa zab bo// rab tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa zab bo//
49b1('bum): rab 'byor da 'du shes zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'du byed zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin da pa zab bo// rab 'byor da rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa
49b2('bum): zab bo/ / rab zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa zab bo// rab 'byor rna ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sna zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lce
49b3('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lus zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
49b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor sgra zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dri zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab// rab 'byor ro zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//
49b5('bum): rab 'byor reg zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor chos zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab// rab 'byor gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//
49b6('bum): rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/
49b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor
50a1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/
50a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yid
50a3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
50a4('bum): ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/
50a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
50a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor khams zab pa'i phyir/
50a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam par
50b1('bum): shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'du byed zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam
50b2('bum): par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//
50b3('bum): rab 'byor reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sred pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor
50b4('bum): len pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor srid pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor skye ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rga shi zab
50b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
50b6('bum): pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor
50b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i
51a1('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
51a2('bum): zab bo/ / rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/
51a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor
51a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dor ba pa stong pa nyid
51a5('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
51a6('bum): phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dngos po
51a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir//
51b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi
51b2('bum): rkang pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dbang po zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor stobs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor
51b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa zab
51b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor tshad pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab
51b5('bum): 'byor gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mthar kyis
51b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
51b7('bum): zab bo/ / rab 'byor mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir/
52a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
52a2('bum): phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
52a3('bum): brgyad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
52a4('bum): pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po ste/ chos rin po che'i phung po rnams
52a5('bum): sgrub pa'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dge bcu'i las kyi lam sgrub pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi sgrub pa'o// tshad pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'o// dran pa
52a6('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgrub pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// dbang po lnga sgrub pa'o// stobs lnga sgrub pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
52a7('bum): brgyad pa sgrub pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrub pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
52b1('bum): pa sgrub pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgrub pa'o// 'jigs pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// snying rje chen po sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi
52b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa brgyad sgrub pa'o/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa'o// rang byang chub sgrub pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
52b3('bum): nyid sgrub pa'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / 'du shes dag pa dang / 'du
52b4('bum): byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / dag pa dang / rna ba dag pa dang / sna dag pa dang / lce dag pa dang / lus dag pa dang / yid dge pa dang / gzugs dag pa dang / sgra dag pa dang / dri dag pa dang / ro dag pa dang /
52b5('bum): reg dag pa dang / chos dag pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / yid
52b6('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te
52b7('bum): reg pa dag pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lus
53a1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sa'i khams dag pa dang / chu'i khams dag pa dang / khams dag pa dang / rlung gi khams dag
53a2('bum): pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dag pa dang / ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / dang gzugs dag pa dang / skye mched drug dag pa dang / reg pa dag pa dang /
53a3('bum): tshor ba dag pa dang / sred pa dag pa dang / len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye bdag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
53a4('bum): phyin pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi nang stong pa
53a5('bum): nyid dag pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dag pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
53a6('bum): dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang /
53a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag pa dang / yang dag par spong bdag pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
53b1('bum): gyi rkang pa dag pa dang / dbang po dag pa dang / stobs dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan dag pa dang / tshad pa dag pa dang /
53b2('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dag pa dang / mngon
53b3('bum): par shes pa dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag pa dang / snying rje chen po dag pa dang /
53b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung
53b5('bum): po'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de lta bu bstan pa'i tshe/ bar chad mang du 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor
53b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bar chad mang po 'byung ste/ de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /
53b7('bum): bsgom par bya ba la bar chad du 'gyur bar bri na yang myur du bri bar bya'o// klag na yang myur du klag go/ bstan na yang myur du bstan to// tshul bzhin du yid la bya na yang myur du tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// bsgom na yang myur du bsgom mo//
54a1('bum): rab 'byor de bas na gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zla ba gcig gis bri bar byas na yang des de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gal te zla ba gnyis sam/ gal te zla ba
54a2('bum): gsum mam/ gal te zla ba bzhi'am/ gal te zla ba lnga'am/ gal te zla ba drug gam/ gal te lo'i bar gyis bri bar byas na yang de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gal te zla ba gcig gis bstan pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul
54a3('bum): bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par byas na yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// gal te lo'i bar gyis bsgom par byas na yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni nor bu rin po che chen po la bar chad mang du
54a4('bum): 'byung ngo / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang bri ba dang / klag pa dang / bstan pa dang / kha ton bgyi ba dang / yid la bgyi ba dang / bsgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to
54a5('bum): can dag bar chad bgyid pa ngo mtshar che'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci nas kyang bri ba dang / klag pa dang / bstan pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul
54a6('bum): bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom pa'i phyir bdud sdig to can bar chad byed pa yang ma yin mod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa
54a7('bum): dang / bsgom pa rnams la bar chad bya bar nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab
54b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bgyi ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ba dang / bsgom pa la bdud sdig to can bgegs bgyid par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas
54b2('bum): kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar nus so//
54b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gi mthus kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
54b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha bton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar nus so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang
54b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
54b6('bum): 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyis yongs su zin pa'i
54b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la/ bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar nus so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni gang du ltar phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad grangs pa dag
55a1('bum): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad grangs pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
55a2('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba la dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / klog cing ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa lo dgongs pa mdzad pa ni chos nyid kyis de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes
55a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa des kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab rmo 'di 'dri'o// klog go/ ston to/ kha ton du byed do// tshul
55a4('bum): bzhin du yid la byed do/ / sgom mo zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab rmo 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton
55a5('bum): du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / sgom mo 'tshal kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyis bzung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
55a6('bum): ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing sgom pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas
55a7('bum): kyi mthu yin par rig par bya'o/ / de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyis bzung ba yin par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog
55b1('bum): pa dang / ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing sgom pa de dag ni shar phyogs nas phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa/
55b2('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gis mkhyen te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing sgom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom
55b3('bum): ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ / thugs su chud do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
55b4('bum): 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing sgom pa de dag ni/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs
55b5('bum): mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad grangs pa de dag gis mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs ca shing thugs su chud
55b6('bum): do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
55b7('bum): la byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag gis kyang / 'di ltar bdag cag ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to// zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang byang
56a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa mang bar 'gyur
56a2('bum): te/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod
56a3('bum): par byed do/ / de ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing 'chang ba de dag kyang don che ba dang / legs pa che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / rnam par smyin pa che bar 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
56a4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir ldog pa'i sa yongs su non gyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs
56a5('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
56a6('bum): phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar
