80b6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gzungs thob par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni gzungs ma thob na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung

81a2('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni bri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ mnyan par 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni bri
81a3('bum): bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ mnyan par 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa
81a4('bum): dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod/ lung 'bog
81a5('bum): par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ mnyan par 'dod la chos smra ba ni bri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi
81a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra
81a7('bum): ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral/ gnod sems dang snyom pa dang / gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bral the tsom dang bral la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas

81b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang /
81b5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i snyan pa brjod/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / kyi yul gyi snyan pa brjod cing / sems can dmyal
81b6('bum): ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ / byol song gi skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo// kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo// khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis shig/ gang la sdug bsngal stong phrag
81b7('bum): mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ khyod yun ring por 'khor ba ni 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
82a1('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
82a2('bum): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
82a3('bum): ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ gzhan
82a4('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
82a5('bum): kyi legs pa rjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshad snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi
82a6('bum): legs pa rjod/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshad dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa
82a7('bum): rjod/ tshad che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa
82b1('bum): rjod/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'og gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs par rjod/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/
82b2('bum): pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod cing / 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o// gzugs kyi khams
82b3('bum): ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o/ / gzugs pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa zhi ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/ de dag kyang rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag do// rnam par 'gyur ba'i
82b4('bum): chos can zad pa'i chos can/ 'jig pa'i chos can/ skye ba'i chos can/ 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyis/ khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir
82b5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig/ 'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig/ phyin chad 'khor ba nam 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
82b6('bum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla

83a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na//
83a2('bum): rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab
83a3('bum): 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu
83a4('bum): rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni tshogs

83a6('bum): su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du/ su nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'drir sbyin no zhes zer la/ chos nyan pa ni phyi bzhin 'brang na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol
83a7('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos
83b1('bum): nyan pa ni chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs 'byed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de
83b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par 'dod/ lung
83b3('bum): 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni zang zing kyi phyir drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i

83b5('bum): 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ sgom par 'dod/ nyan par 'dod la chos smra ba ni zang zing kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par 'dod/ 'drir gzhug par 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par
83b6('bum): 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod/ sgom du gzhug par 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa
83b7('bum): dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs
84a1('bum): der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang
84a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'a dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab
84a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na
84a4('bum): zas dkon pa dang / chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa 'i rgyu rkyen ldan
84a5('bum): pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na zas dkon pa dang / chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba
84a6('bum): ni der 'gro bar 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
84a7('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas mod pa dang / chu mod pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa yang rjes su 'brang na/ des de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod zang zing gi don
84b1('bum): tu song ste ji rung / legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig/ zas thob ma thob dang bsod bsod kyis 'gyod par gyur ta re zhes zer na/ de'i phyir chos ston pa des kyang / thabs phra mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/ de
84b2('bum): yang dga' zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/ 'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi/ spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
84b3('bum): pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i
84b4('bum): 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / sprul gyi 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa dag kyang chos kyi don tu chos kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/ dge slong
84b5('bum): chos smra bas chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad smras te/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / sprul gyi 'jigs pa
84b6('bum): dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der song ste/ ci rung zhes de ltar dge slong chos smra ba des chos bstan pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par 'dod/
84b7('bum): lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par 'dod par gyur la/ de dag gis dge slong chos smra ba'i tshig de dag thos nas/ dga' zhing dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te/ dge slong
85a1('bum): chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
85a2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par 'gyur te/ de bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor gyur pas bsod snyoms gtong
85a3('bum): ba'i grong de dag yang dang yang blta bar sems shing / der yang dang yang blta bas chos nyan pa phyir zlog cing / tshe dang ldan pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong ba lta dgos te/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes
85a4('bum): nas/ des chos nyan pa de dag phyir bzlog pa'i phyir 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
85a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar 'gyur ba
85a6('bum): dang / lung 'bog par 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom
85a7('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du bgyis shing / ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / lung
85b1('bum): 'bog par 'gyur ba dang / kha ton bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de la bdud sdig to can
85b2('bum): dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / 'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin te/ ji skad du khyed klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes dbyen byed cing zlog
85b3('bum): la mos pa par byed do/ / rab 'byor de la bdud sdig to can gyis de ltar dbyen byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lung ma bstan pa de dag ni the tsom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag the tsom du gyur nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
85b4('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ lung 'bog par 'gyur/ kha ton byed par 'gyur/ sgom par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
85b5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa 'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to
85b6('bum): can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni
85b7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro//
86a1('bum): de ni rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ des tshig de thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
86a2('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi
86a3('bum): las mang du 'byung ste/ bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o// rig par byas nas rnam par spang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
86a4('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bgyi ste/ spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
86a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor
86a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las te/ de dag
86a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/ rnam par spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
86b1('bum): dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste rnam par spang bar bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
86b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang
86b3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
86b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i
86b5('bum): sgom tshan ma pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa pa gang gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub
86b6('bum): thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar bsnyen te/ de yang de la dga' ba bskyed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
86b7('bum): zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag
87a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du lus gser gyi kha dog dang / chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs te/
87a2('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mos pa bskyed do// des mos pa bskyed nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyam par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
87a3('bum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs
87a4('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas las pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nye bar ston te/ des de la 'dod pa skyed cing / bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
87a5('bum): rgyas 'di lta bur shog shig/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis chos ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du bdag gis
87a6('bum): kyang chos bstan par bya'o zhes de de la 'dod pa skyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
87a7('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma/ byang chub
87b1('bum): sems dpa' stong phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
87b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la 'dod pa skyed par 'gyur ro// des
87b3('bum): de dag la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
87b4('bum): pa dang / sgom pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
87b5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gzugs do/ / tshor ba do// 'du shes do// 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa do// do// rna ba do// sna do// lce do// lus do// yid do// gzugs do//
87b6('bum): sgra do// dri med do// ro do// reg do// chos do// gi rnam par shes pa do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa do// sna'i rnam par shes pa do// lce'i rnam par shes pa do// lus kyi rnam par shes
87b7('bum): pa do/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa do/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa do// yid
88a1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa do/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
88a2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba do/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// sa'i khams do// chu'i khams do// khams do// rlung gi khams do// nam
88a3('bum): mkha'i khams do/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams do// ma rig pa do// 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa do// dang gzugs do// skye mched drug do// reg pa do// tshor ba do// sred pa do//
88a4('bum): len pa do// srid pa do// skye ba do// rga shi do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa do//
88a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa do// nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid do// don
88a6('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
88a7('bum): stong pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
88b1('bum): stong pa nyid do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams do// yang dag par spong ba rnams do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams do// dbang po rnams do// stobs rnams do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams do// 'phags
88b2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams do// bsam gtan rnams do// tshad pa rnams do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams do// rnam par thar pa brgyad do//
88b3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa do// mngon par shes pa rnams do// ting nge 'dzin rnams do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
88b4('bum): do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu do// 'jigs pa bzhi do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi do// byams pa chen po do// snying rje chen po do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad do//
88b5('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu do// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
88b6('bum): pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor gang la gzugs pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
88b7('bum): stong ngo / / gang la tshor ba pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la 'du
89a1('bum): shes pa de la sangs rgyas do/ / byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la 'du byed
89a2('bum): pa de la sangs rgyas do/ / byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rnam par shes pa pa de la sangs rgyas do//
89a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang
89a4('bum): sangs rgyas do/ / nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rna ba pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos
89a5('bum): do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sna pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
89a6('bum): 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / gang la lce pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang
89a7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo / / gang la lus pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la
89b1('bum): yid pa de la sangs rgyas do/ / byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs pa de la sangs rgyas do//
89b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sgra pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs
89b3('bum): rgyas do/ / nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la dri pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do//
89b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la ro pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
89b5('bum): 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / gang la reg pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
89b6('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / gang la chos pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
89b7('bum): gang la gi rnam par shes pa pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
90a1('bum): gang la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa de la sangs rgyas do/ byang chub sems dpa' do/ rang sangs rgya sa do/ nyan thos do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /
90a2('bum): gang la sna'i rnam par shes pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lce'i rnam par
90a3('bum): shes pa pa de la sangs rgyas do/ / byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa
90a4('bum): de la sangs rgyas do/ / byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa de la sangs rgyas do//
90a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la gi 'dus te reg pa pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems
90a6('bum): dpa' do/ / rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do//
90a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs
90b1('bum): rgyas do/ / nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos
90b2('bum): do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i
90b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
90b4('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos do// de
90b5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan
90b6('bum): thos do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang
90b7('bum): sangs rgyas do/ / nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa'
91a1('bum): do/ / rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa de la sangs rgyas
91a2('bum): do/ / byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa de
91a3('bum): la sangs rgyas do/ / byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sa'i khams pa de la sangs rgyas do//
91a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la chu'i khams pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub
91a5('bum): sems dpa' do/ / rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la me'i khams pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems
91a6('bum): dpa' do/ / rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rlung gi khams pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do//
91a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la nam mkha'i khams pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs
91b1('bum): rgyas do/ / nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rnam par shes pa'i khams pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos
91b2('bum): do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la ma rig pa pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
91b3('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / gang la 'du byed pa de la sangs rgyas do// byang chub sems dpa' do// rang sangs rgyas do// nyan thos do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis

96a1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha

96a6('bum): dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing slar rgol ba mang ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
96a7('bum): 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag la yang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// slar rgol
96b1('bum): ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang /

96b3('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni blo rgyu shin tu chung bar
96b4('bum): 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems 'jug go// de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri klog/ lung 'bog/ kha ton bgyid/ sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
96b5('bum): de/ gzhan 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag la yang bar chad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

96b7('bum): klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
97a1('bum): bskyed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu chung ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsgrubs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa sha stag 'byung ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni blo chung zhing blo
97a2('bum): zhan par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri/ klog/ lung 'bog/ kha ton byed/ sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gzhan 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang /

97a4('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag la bdud kyi las 'di dag kyang 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang / rab 'byor
97a5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog cing kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
97a6('bum): byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha la rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sbyin
97a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stong pa
97b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
97b2('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang
97b3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
97b4('bum): dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag
97b5('bum): pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stobs
97b6('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
97b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshad pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
98a1('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon
98a2('bum): pa pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
98a3('bum): stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas
98a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed na/
98a5('bum): rab 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par shes par bya ste/ des rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/ klog go// lung 'bog go/ kha ton byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do//
98a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol
98a7('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi stong pa
98b1('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
98b2('bum): byed do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su
98b3('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
98b4('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
98b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dbang po
98b6('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gong du
98b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshad pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su
99a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
99a2('bum): smon pa pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
99a3('bum): stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi
99a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
99a5('bum): byed do/ / shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa
99a6('bum): dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
99a7('bum): mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
99b1('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang /
99b2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
99b3('bum): phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
99b4('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin
99b5('bum): du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi
99b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
99b7('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa

100a4('bum): du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ / steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri
100a5('bum): ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir ldog pa gang ji
100a6('bum): snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu
100a7('bum): brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ / lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri
100b1('bum): zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir
100b2('bum): ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson

100b4('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir
100b5('bum): ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par
100b6('bum): byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /
100b7('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir ldog pa
101a1('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu

101a3('bum): klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir
101a4('bum): ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed
101a5('bum): cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ / steng gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang /
101a6('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bud la la zhig la bu lnga 'am/ bcu'am/
101a7('bum): nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya 'am/ stong zhig yod na/ de dag ni ma de ci nas kyang na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing / bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na nad par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di
101b1('bum): la ji ltar na bar chad du 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ji ltar bya/ bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la bde ba'i nyams par bya na ji ltar bya/ 'di ni bdag cag skyed
101b2('bum): skyed pa ste/ srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes de dag ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do// de dag ni 'di'i srog gi bar chad du gyur du 'ong ngo // lus nyams chung bar gyur du 'ong ngo // lus la sha sbrang dang / sbrang
101b3('bum): bu dang / sbrul gyis gtse ba'i bde bas bab tu 'ong ngo // tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes phu dud legs par bya bas phu dud byed do// de ltar bu de dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed
101b4('bum): pa'o/ / 'di ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun tu rim gro byed cing / sti stang dang / bkur sti cher byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
101b5('bum): rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed skyed
101b6('bum): pa'o/ / 'jig rten 'di ston ston pa'o zhes rgyun tu gzigs shing dgongs so// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed
101b7('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// lho phyogs
102a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas

102a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun
102a4('bum): 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
102a5('bum): chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
102a6('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
102a7('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed da dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
102b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so//
102b2('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
102b3('bum): 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin
102b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan
102b5('bum): gyis rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
102b6('bum): 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
102b7('bum): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang
103a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
103a2('bum): rgyas rnams skyed skyed pa'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di yang ston ston pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs
103a3('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di
103a4('bum): las byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / 'di las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di las byung ba
103a5('bum): ni nang stong pa nyid do/ / 'di las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni don dam pa stong
103a6('bum): pa nyid do/ / 'di las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do// 'di
103a7('bum): las byung ba ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid do/ / 'di las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni pa
103b1('bum): stong pa nyid do/ / 'di las byung ba ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni
103b2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ / 'di las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni dbang po rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni stobs rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni
103b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ / 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni tshad pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni gzugs pa'i snyoms
103b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams so/ / 'di las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// 'di las byung ba ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// 'di las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang
103b5('bum): smon pa pa'o/ / 'di las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//
103b6('bum): 'di las byung ba ni 'jigs pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba
103b7('bum): ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ / 'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'di las byung ba ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni rang byang chub bo// 'di
104a1('bum): las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ / 'di las byung ba ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// 'di las byung ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so// 'di
104a2('bum): las byung ba ni phyir 'ong ba rnams mo/ / 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
104a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las brten te/ bla na pa yang
104a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
104a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
104a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni de
104a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ci nas kyang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyam par 'gyur bar rtag tu rgyun 'chad par bsrung ba mdzad do/ / rab
104b1('bum): 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten ston
104b2('bum): pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
104b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun pa lags/ 'jig rten ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang la gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das
104b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed do// 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed do// byams pa chen po
104b5('bum): bskyed do/ / snying rje chen po bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad bskyed do// thams cad shes pa nyid bskyed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskyed do// rab 'byor
104b6('bum): chos de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs par brjod de/ rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'jig
104b7('bum): rten gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mos phung po lnga
105a1('bum): ni ji ltar bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji ltar phung po lnga ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po lnga po 'di
105a2('bum): dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin/ rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin te/ skye zhes bya bar ston to// 'gag ces bya bar ston to// kun nas nyon mongs shes bya bar ston to// rnam par byang zhes bya bar ston to// 'phel zhes bya
105a3('bum): bar ston to/ / 'grib ces bya bar ston to// blang zhes bya bar ston to// dor zhes bya bar ston to// 'das shes bya bar ston to// ma 'ongs shes bya bar ston to// da ltar byung zhes bya bar ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
105a4('bum): stong pa nyid la 'jig pa do// rab tu 'jig pa do// mtshan ma pa la 'jig pa do// rab tu 'jig pa do// smon pa pa la 'jig pa do// rab tu 'jig pa do// mngon par 'du bya ba pa la 'jig
105a5('bum): pa'am rab tu 'jig pa do/ / skye ba pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa do// dngos po pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa do// rang bzhin pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa do// rab 'byor de ltar
105a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ston par gsungs te/ rab 'byor sems can tshad grangs dpag tu pa'i sems dang spyod pa mkhyen pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la
105a7('bum): brten cing rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni sems can do// sems can du gdags pa so// gzugs do// gzugs su gdags pa so// tshor ba do//
105b1('bum): tshor bar gdags pa so// 'du shes do// 'du shes su gdags pa so// 'du byed do// 'du byed du gdags pa so// rnam par shes pa do// rnam par shes par gdags pa so//
105b2('bum): do// tu gdags pa so// rna ba do// rna bar gdags pa so// sna do// snar gdags pa so// lce do// lcer gdags pa so// lus do// lus su gdags pa
105b3('bum): so/ / yid med do// yid du gdags pa so// gzugs do// gzugs su gdags pa so// sgra do// sgrar gdags pa so// dri do// drir gdags pa so/ ro do// ror gdags
105b4('bum): pa so/ / reg do// reg tu gdags pa so// chos do// chos su gdags pa so// gi rnam par shes pa do// gi rnam par shes par gdags pa so// rna ba'i rnam par shes
105b5('bum): pa do/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa so// sna'i rnam par shes pa do// sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa so// lce'i rnam par shes pa do// lce'i rnam par shes pa gdags pa
105b6('bum): so/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa do// lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa so// gi 'dus te reg pa
105b7('bum): do/ / gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa
106a1('bum): so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa so// yid kyi 'dus te
106a2('bum): reg pa do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
106a3('bum): tshor ba do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa so// lce'i 'dus te reg
106a4('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa so//
106a5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa so// sa'i khams do// sa'i khams su gdags pa so// chu'i khams do// chu'i khams su
106a6('bum): gdags pa so/ / khams do// khams su gdags pa so// rlung gi khams do// rlung gi khams su gdags pa so// nam mkha'i khams do// nam mkha'i khams su
106a7('bum): gdags pa so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa so// ma rig pa do// ma rig par gdags pa so// 'du byed do// 'du byed du gdags
106b1('bum): pa so/ / rnam par shes pa do// rnam par shes par gdags pa so// dang gzugs do// dang gzugs su gdags pa so// skye mched drug do// skye mched drug tu gdags pa so// reg pa
106b2('bum): do/ / reg par gdags pa so// tshor ba do// tshor bar gdags pa so// sred pa do// sred par gdags pa so// len po do// len par gdags pa so// srid pa do// srid
106b3('bum): par gdags pa so/ / skye ba do// skye bar gdags pa so// rga shi do// rga shir gdags pa so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa so// tshul
106b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa do//

106b6('bum): gdags pa so/ / nang stong pa nyid do// nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// phyi nang stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa so//
106b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// chen po stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// don dam pa stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid du
107a1('bum): gdags pa so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// mtha' las
107a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid do//
107a3('bum): dor ba pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa
107a4('bum): so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// pa stong pa nyid do// pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid do//
107a5('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
107a6('bum): du gdags pa so/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams do// dran pa nye bar gzhag par gdags pa so// yang dag par spong ba rnams do// yang dag par spong bar gdags pa so// rdzu
107a7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa so// dbang po rnams do// dbang por gdags pa so// stobs rnams do// stobs su gdags pa so// byang chub kyi
107b1('bum): yan lag rnams do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag du gdags pa so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams do//
107b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa so// bsam gtan rnams do// bsam gtan du gdags pa so// tshad pa rnams do// tshad par gdags pa so// gzugs pa'i
107b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams do/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa so// rnam par thar pa brgyad do// rnam par thar pa brgyad du gdags pa so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i
107b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu do/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur gdags pa so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa do// rnam
107b5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa par gdags pa so// mngon par shes pa rnams do// mngon par shes par gdags pa so// ting nge 'dzin rnams do//

108a3('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ston pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no// tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no// 'du shes ston par
108a4('bum): byed pa ma yin no/ / 'du byed ston par byed pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no// ston par byed pa ma yin no// rna ba ston par byed pa ma yin no// sna ston par byed pa ma yin no// lce ston par byed pa ma yin no// lus ston par byed pa ma yin no// yid ston

109a1('bum): tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/ / nang stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no// chen
