130a7('bum): mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol
130b1('bum): tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba ma
130b2('bum): mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i
130b3('bum): slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i
130b4('bum): slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba pa stong pa
130b5('bum): nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang gi
130b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
130b7('bum): lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
131a1('bum): mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/
131a2('bum): ji ltar na dbang po rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na stobs rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
131a3('bum): lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan rnams
131a4('bum): mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tshad pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/
131a5('bum): ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid mthong ba ma
131a6('bum): mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na smon pa pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams mthong
131a7('bum): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin
131b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/
131b2('bum): ji ltar na snying rje chen po mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i
131b3('bum): slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid
131b4('bum): mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams
131b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam gzugs la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba pa'i phyir ston
131b6('bum): pa'o/ / nam tshor ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshor ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam 'du shes la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du shes mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o//
131b7('bum): nam 'du byed la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du byed mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rnam par shes pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mthong ba pa'i
132a1('bum): phyir ston pa'o/ / nam la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rna ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston
132a2('bum): pa'o/ / nam sna la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam lce la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam lus la
132a3('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lus mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam yid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam gzugs la pa'i rnam par
132a4('bum): shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam sgra la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sgra mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam dri la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i
132a5('bum): tshe/ dri mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam ro la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ ro mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam reg la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ reg mthong ba
132a6('bum): pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam chos la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ chos mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam gi rnam par shes pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ gi rnam
132a7('bum): par shes pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam sna'i rnam par shes pa la
132b1('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam lce'i rnam par shes pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o//
132b2('bum): nam lus kyi rnam par shes pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam
132b3('bum): par shes pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam gi 'dus te reg pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ gi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la pa'i rnam
132b4('bum): par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam
132b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus
132b6('bum): te reg pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
132b7('bum): tshor ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa
133a1('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te
133a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam
133a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la
133a4('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam sa'i khams la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sa'i khams mthong ba pa'i phyir
133a5('bum): ston pa'o/ / nam chu'i khams la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ chu'i khams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam khams la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ khams mthong
133a6('bum): ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam rlung gi khams la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rlung gi khams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam nam mkha'i khams la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/
133a7('bum): nam mkha'i khams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rnam par shes pa'i khams la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam ma rig pa la
133b1('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ ma rig pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam 'du byed la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du byed mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rnam par shes pa la pa'i rnam par
133b2('bum): shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam dang gzugs la pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dang gzugs mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam skye mched drug la
133b3('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ skye mched drug mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam reg pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ reg pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam tshor ba la pa'i
133b4('bum): rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshor ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam sred pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sred pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam len pa la pa'i rnam par
133b5('bum): shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ len pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam srid pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ srid pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam skye ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa
133b6('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ skye ba mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rga shi la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rga shi mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la pa'i rnam par
133b7('bum): shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong
134a1('bum): ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
134a2('bum): tu phyin pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam
134a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam nang
134a4('bum): stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam phyi stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir
134a5('bum): ston pa'o/ / nam phyi nang stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ stong pa
134a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam chen po stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam don dam pa stong pa nyid la pa'i
134a7('bum): rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam 'dus byas stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o//
134b1('bum): nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/
134b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston
134b3('bum): pa'o/ / nam dor ba pa stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/
134b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam chos thams cad stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rang gi mtshan nyid
134b5('bum): stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam pa stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/
134b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam dngos po pa stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
134b7('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo
135a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam yang dag par
135a2('bum): spong ba la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba
135a3('bum): pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam dbang po la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ dbang po rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam stobs la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ stobs rnams mthong ba pa'i
135a4('bum): phyir ston pa'o/ / nam byang chub kyi yan lag la pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la pa'i rnam par shes
135a5('bum): pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam 'phags pa'i bden pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston
135a6('bum): pa'o/ / nam bsam gtan la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam tshad pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshad pa rnams mthong
135a7('bum): ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rnam par thar pa
135b1('bum): brgyad la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ mthar kyis
135b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
135b3('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam mngon par shes pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam ting nge
135b4('bum): 'dzin la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam gzungs kyi sgo la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir
135b5('bum): ston pa'o/ / nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam 'jigs pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa
135b6('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'jigs pa rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam so so yang dag par rig pa la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o//
135b7('bum): nam snying rje chen po la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ snying rje chen po mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ sangs
136a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam
136a2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyir 'ong
136a3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ / nam dgra bcom pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rang byang chub la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung
136a4('bum): ba'i tshe/ rang byang chub mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rnam pa
136a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs
136a6('bum): pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten du stong pa
136a7('bum): zhes rjod de/ 'jig rten du ci stong pa zhes rjod ce na/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshor ba stong ngo zhes byu bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du shes stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du byed stong ngo zhes bya
136b1('bum): bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sna stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
136b2('bum): rten du rjod do/ / lus stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sgra stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dri stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzod do//
136b3('bum): ro stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// reg stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzod do// chos stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya
136b4('bum): bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid kyi rnam par
136b5('bum): shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / gi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do//
136b6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
136b7('bum): ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lce'i 'dus te reg
137a1('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
137a2('bum): rten du rjod do/ / sa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chu'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rlung gi khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do//
137a3('bum): nam mkha'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ma rig pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do//
137a4('bum): rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dang gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// skye mched drug stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshor
137a5('bum): ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du dzod do/ / sred pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// len pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// srid pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// skye ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
137a6('bum): rjod do/ / rga shi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo
137a7('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya
137b1('bum): bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
137b2('bum): du rjod do/ / chen po stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
137b3('bum): rten du rjod do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do// rang bzhin
137b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
137b5('bum): du rjod do/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
137b6('bum): rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dbang po rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do//
137b7('bum): stobs rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong ngo
138a1('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / bsam gtan rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshad pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
138a2('bum): rten du rjod do/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa
138a3('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / mngon par shes pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rdzod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// de bzhin gshegs
138a4('bum): pa'i stobs bcu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / 'jigs pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// byams pa chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do//
138a5('bum): snying rje chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
138a6('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dgra bcom pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rang byang chub stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes
138a7('bum): pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor
138b1('bum): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar ston/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar rjod/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar shes par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs
138b2('bum): pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ji ltar ston ce na/ 'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston
138b3('bum): to/ / 'jig rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'du shes stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na stong zhes
138b4('bum): bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na rna ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sna stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lus stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na yid stong zhes bya bar ston to//
138b5('bum): 'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sgra stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dri stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na ro stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na reg stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten
138b6('bum): na chos stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig
138b7('bum): rten na lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya
139a1('bum): bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lus
139a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
139a3('bum): tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
139a4('bum): kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig
139a5('bum): rten na khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig
139a6('bum): rten na ma rig pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dang gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na skye mched
139a7('bum): drug stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sred pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na len pa stong zhes bya bar ston to//
139b1('bum): 'jig rten na srid pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na skye ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rga shi stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
139b2('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to//
139b3('bum): 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig
139b4('bum): rten na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to//
139b5('bum): 'jig rten na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dor ba
139b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya
139b7('bum): bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dngos
140a1('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul
140a2('bum): kyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na
140a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na tshad pa rnams
140a4('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rnam par thar pa brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
140a5('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na ting nge 'dzin
140a6('bum): rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'jigs pa bzhi stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig
140a7('bum): rten na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad
140b1('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dgra
140b2('bum): bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jig rten na rang byang chub stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor
140b3('bum): de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa// rab 'byor
140b4('bum): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to//
140b5('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam
140b6('bum): gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / gi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten bsam gyis
140b7('bum): khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten bsam
141a1('bum): gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / dri'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to//
141a2('bum): chos kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i

141a6('bum): te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces

141b4('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to//

141b6('bum): khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / srid pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
141b7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi
142a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam

142b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston
142b2('bum): to/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi
142b3('bum): yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya
142b4('bum): bar ston to/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// tshad pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis
142b5('bum): khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i
142b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten
142b7('bum): bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'jigs pa bzhi'i
143a1('bum): 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig
143a2('bum): rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
143a3('bum): bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis
143a4('bum): khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
143a5('bum): pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rten ji ltar dben zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi
143a6('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar
143a7('bum): ston to/ / sna'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben
143b1('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / sgra'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya
143b2('bum): bar ston to/ / gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par
143b3('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes
143b4('bum): bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te
143b5('bum): reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
143b6('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi
143b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i
144a1('bum): khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam
144a2('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dang gzugs kyi
144a3('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston
144a4('bum): to/ / len pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten
144a5('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya
144a6('bum): bar ston to/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid
144a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
144b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
144b2('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben
144b3('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar
144b4('bum): ston to/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
144b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po
144b6('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
144b7('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshad pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben
145a1('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
145a2('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes
145a3('bum): bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
145a4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten
145a5('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig
145a6('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//

145b1('bum): skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi

146a4('bum): te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las

147a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten

147a4('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya

148a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig

148a7('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs
148b1('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes
148b2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten
148b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten ngo bo
148b4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dri'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
148b5('bum): bya bar ston to/ / gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
148b6('bum): ston to/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
148b7('bum): ston to/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
149a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gi
149a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo
149a3('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus
149a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo
149a5('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
149a6('bum): bar ston to/ / ma rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten
149a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i
149b1('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / len pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten
149b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pho rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten
149b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig
149b4('bum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
149b5('bum): to/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus
149b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// thog
149b7('bum): ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
150a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
150a2('bum): bya bar ston to/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
150a3('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo
150a4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
150a5('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten
150a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshad pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi
150a7('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
150b1('bum): pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong
150b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
150b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
150b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig
150b5('bum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong
150b6('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
150b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya

151b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo

151b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
151b5('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
151b6('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi
151b7('bum): 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

152a3('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston/ skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos
152a4('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten dngos

152a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
152a7('bum): bar ston to/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha
152b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
152b2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po
152b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa
152b4('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i
152b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//

152b7('bum): 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i
153a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
153a2('bum): to/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten
153a3('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan
153a4('bum): lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos
153a5('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshad pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs
153a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
153a7('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon
153b1('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
153b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par
153b3('bum): rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
153b4('bum): bar ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong
153b5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
153b6('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
153b7('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin
154a1('bum): gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig
154a2('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
154a3('bum): bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i
154a4('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / reg gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
154a5('bum): bya bar ston to/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
154a6('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i
154a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i
154b1('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi
154b2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
154b3('bum): chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes
154b4('bum): pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dang gzugs kyi 'jig
154b5('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// len
154b6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
154b7('bum): ston to/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha
155a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
155a2('bum): bya bar ston to/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
155a3('bum): bya bar ston to/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang
155a4('bum): tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
155a5('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid
155a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
155a7('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi
155b1('bum): yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi
155b2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshad pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
155b3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par
155b4('bum): shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig
155b5('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen
155b6('bum): po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
155b7('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lam
156a1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing
156a2('bum): 'jig rten ston pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa
156a3('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa
156a4('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
156a5('bum): lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dri'i
156a6('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gi rnam par
156a7('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
156b1('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
156b2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
156b3('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
156b4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
156b5('bum): ston to/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
156b6('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ / chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i
156b7('bum): khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
157a1('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
