157a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
157a5('bum): ston to/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
157a6('bum): to/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa
157a7('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong
157b1('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dor ba pa stong pa nyid
157b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
157b3('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa
157b4('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong
157b5('bum): pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi
157b6('bum): yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
157b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshad pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam
158a1('bum): par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
158a2('bum): pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo
158a3('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig
158a4('bum): pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi
158a5('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyir 'ong ba'i
158a6('bum): 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi
158a7('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston
158b1('bum): pa'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ci ltar ston ce na/ ji nas kyang
158b2('bum): 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su yang 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha
158b3('bum): rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam
158b4('bum): gyis khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du
158b5('bum): ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
158b6('bum): de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi
158b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
159a1('bum): don mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
159a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su gtang ba'i don to// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
159a3('bum): tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin
159a4('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis khyab ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs
159a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byar ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dpag tu pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
159a6('bum): sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang de/ rab 'byor rnam
159a7('bum): grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
159b1('bum): don gzhal du pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du de/ sus kyang gzhal bar nus so// rab 'byor
159b2('bum): rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don
159b3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas mnyam pa'ang su 'ang na/ lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor
159b4('bum): rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
159b5('bum): nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
159b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis khyab bo// rab 'byor sangs
159b7('bum): rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis khyab dpag
160a1('bum): tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba yang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du shes kyang bsam gyis khyab
160a2('bum): dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu

172a3('bum): mchis shing / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/

172a5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/

178a7('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /

178b2('bum): dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
178b3('bum): mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam
178b4('bum): pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg la pha bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa
178b5('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa

179a1('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa pa

182b6('bum): dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu

184a6('bum): reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir

184b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab
184b2('bum): dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
184b3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
184b4('bum): so/ / rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa
184b5('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
184b6('bum): de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
184b7('bum): khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor
185a1('bum): sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so//
185a2('bum): rab 'byor chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor
185a3('bum): khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rlung gi khams
185a4('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams
185a5('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rnam par
185a6('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
185a7('bum): so/ / rab 'byor ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor
185b1('bum): 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo
185b2('bum): nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor dang gzugs kyi
185b3('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor skye mched drug gi ngo bo
185b4('bum): nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa go// rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam
185b5('bum): gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab
185b6('bum): dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so/ rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu
185b7('bum): gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu
186a1('bum): gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag
186a2('bum): tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal
186a3('bum): du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rga shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/
186a4('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/
186a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab
186a6('bum): dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
186a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab
186b1('bum): 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam
186b2('bum): pa so/ / rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
186b3('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam
186b4('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la bsam
186b5('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa
186b6('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi nang stong
186b7('bum): pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
187a1('bum): ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/
187a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal
187a3('bum): du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab
187a4('bum): dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
187a5('bum): nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor mtha'
187a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
187a7('bum): mnyam pa so/ / rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
187b1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
187b2('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam
187b3('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad
187b4('bum): stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
187b5('bum): de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/
187b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu
187b7('bum): gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab
188a1('bum): dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
188a2('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor dran
188a3('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
188a4('bum): so/ / rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
188a5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so/ / rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
188a6('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang
188a7('bum): po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
188b1('bum): phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
188b2('bum): de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du
188b3('bum): la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
188b4('bum): gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams
188b5('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor tshad
188b6('bum): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so//
188b7('bum): rab 'byor gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang
189a1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par
189a2('bum): thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang
189a3('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
189a4('bum): smon pa pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
189a5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la
189a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
189a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang
189b1('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/
189b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag
189b3('bum): tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid
189b4('bum): bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor byams pa
189b5('bum): chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor
189b6('bum): snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so//
189b7('bum): rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la bsam pa dang
190a1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
190a2('bum): de'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu du gzhal du
190a3('bum): la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
190a4('bum): khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mo// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo
190a5('bum): nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor rang byang chub
190a6('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// rab 'byor lam gyi
190a7('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam
190b1('bum): pa so/ / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du la/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
190b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs gang
190b3('bum): bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba su yod
190b4('bum): dam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang
190b5('bum): mnyam pa de la 'du byed su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa su yod dam/ gang bsam gyis khyab
190b6('bum): pag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la su yod dam/ rna ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba su yod dam/ sna gang bsam
190b7('bum): gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce su yod dam/ lus
191a1('bum): gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus su yod dam/ yid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
191a2('bum): yid dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs su yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/
191a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dri su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/
191a4('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro su yod dam/ reg gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du
191a5('bum): pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos su yod dam/ gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gi rnam par shes pa su yod dam/ rna
191a6('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa
191a7('bum): ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i rnam par shes pa su yod dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i rnam par shes pa su
191b1('bum): yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu
191b2('bum): gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa su yod dam/ gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gi 'dus
191b3('bum): te reg pa su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam
191b4('bum): gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang
191b5('bum): mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa su yodad ma/
191b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa su yod dam/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis
191b7('bum): khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu
192a1('bum): gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/
192a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
192a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
192a4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmigs
192a5('bum): su yod dam/ sa'i khams gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sa'i khams su yod dam/ chu'i khams gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du
192a6('bum): pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams su yod dam/ khams gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la khams su yod dam/
192a7('bum): rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams su yod dam/ nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du
192b1('bum): pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nam mkha'i khams su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khams
192b2('bum): su yod dam/ ma rig pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam
192b3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa su yod dam/ dang gzugs gang
192b4('bum): bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dang gzugs su yod dam/ skye mched drug gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
192b5('bum): skye mched drug su yod dam/ reg pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg pa su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/
192b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa su yod dam/ len pa gang bsam gyis khyab
192b7('bum): dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la len pa su yod dam/ srid pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la srid pa su yod dam/
193a1('bum): skye ba gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye ba su yod dam/ rga shi gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
193a2('bum): rga shi su yod dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa su yod dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
193a3('bum): gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su yod dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/
193a4('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la brtson 'grus kyi
193a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa su yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa su yod dam/
193a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su yod dam/ nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag
193a7('bum): tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi stong pa nyid
193b1('bum): su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang stong pa nyid su yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag
193b2('bum): tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid su yod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po
193b3('bum): stong pa nyid su yod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid su yod dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
193b4('bum): gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid su yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du
193b5('bum): pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid su yod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu med gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha'
193b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid su yod dam/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid
193b7('bum): su yod dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dor ba pa stong pa nyid su yod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam
194a1('bum): gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa
194a2('bum): ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid su yod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong
194a3('bum): pa nyid su yod dam/ pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la pa stong pa nyid su yod dam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid gang
194a4('bum): bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po pa stong pa nyid su yod dam/ ngo bo stong nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam
194a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid su yod dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
194a6('bum): nyid su yod dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba gang
194a7('bum): bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la yang dag par spong ba rnams su yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang par gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/
194b1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su yod dam/ dbang po gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dbang po rnams su yod dam/ stobs gang bsam
194b2('bum): gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la stobs rnams su yod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la
194b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
194b4('bum): su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su yod dam/ bsam gtan gang bsam gyis khyab dpag
194b5('bum): tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la bsam gtan rnams su yod dam/ tshad pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la tshad pa rnams
194b6('bum): su yod dam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su yod dam/
194b7('bum): rnam par thar pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar pa rnams su yod dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis khyab
195a1('bum): dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
195a2('bum): pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa su yod dam/ mngon par shes pa gang bsam
195a3('bum): gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mngon par shes pa rnams su yod dam/ ting nge 'dzin gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam
195a4('bum): pa de dag la ting nge 'dzin rnams su yod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzungs kyi sgo rnams su yod dam/ de bzhin gshegs
195a5('bum): pa'i stobs gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su yod dam/ 'jigs pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu
195a6('bum): gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'jigs pa rnams su yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
195a7('bum): de dag la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su yod dam/ byams pa chen po gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la byams pa chen po su yod dam/
195b1('bum): snying rje chen po gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la snying rje chen po su yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa
195b2('bum): ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dmigs su yod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rgyun tu
195b3('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu su yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ phyir
195b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu su yod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/
195b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dgra bcom pa nyid su yod ma/ rang byang chub gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang byang chub su yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa
195b6('bum): shes pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa shis pa nyid su yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal
195b7('bum): du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs
196a1('bum): 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir
196a2('bum): bsam gyis khyab pa'o/ / dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu pa'o// tshad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du pa'o// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des ni chos
196a3('bum): thams cad bsam gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ bsam
196a4('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'o/ / dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu pa'o// tshad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du pa'o// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ mnyam pa dang mnyam
196a5('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor bsam gyis khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du pa'i tshig so// rab 'byor dpag tu ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu rung ba'i tshig so// rab 'byor gzhal du ces bya ba 'di ni tshad
196a6('bum): pa'i tshig so/ / rab 'byor mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam pa pa'i tshig te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam
196a7('bum): gyis khyab dpag tu gzhal du pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro// dpag tu ces bya ba ni nam mkha'
196b1('bum): dpag tu pa'i phyir ro/ / gzhal du ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir ro// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
196b2('bum): pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis khyab pa dpag tu pa gzhal du pa/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de dag ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am dpag par nus te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas
196b3('bum): rnams ni gzhal du do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du do// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis khyab pa dang dpag tu pa dang gzhal du pa dang / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u
196b4('bum): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shus nye bar len pa par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen pha stong phrag
196b5('bum): drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom ldan
196b6('bum): 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu gsum mo// //
196b7('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad
197a1('bum): du nye bar gnas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol
197a2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
197a3('bum): de de bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
197a4('bum): pa 'di ni don tshad pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//
197a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus so//
197a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// chen po stong pa nyid 'dus so// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// thog ma dang tha ma
197a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po
197b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dus so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so// dbang po lnga 'dus so//
197b2('bum): stobs lnga 'dus so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so// bsam gtan bzhi 'dus so// tshad pa bzhi 'dus so// gzugs pa'i snyoms
197b3('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi 'dus so/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dus so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dus so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'dus so// mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus so//
197b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus so// 'jigs pa bzhi 'dus so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so// byams pa chen po 'dus so// snying
197b5('bum): rje chen po 'dus so/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad 'dus so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so// rang
197b6('bum): byang chub 'dus so/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa 'am/
197b7('bum): yul gyi dgos pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/ de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos
198a1('bum): sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi
198a2('bum): bya ba byed do/ / rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba
198a3('bum): dpag tu pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba gzhal du pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir
198a4('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ni gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang mngon par chags
198a5('bum): pa par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o//
198a6('bum): rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa
198a7('bum): pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar
198b1('bum): gnas pa'o/ / lus la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// gzugs la yongs su 'dzin
198b2('bum): pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// sgra la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// dri la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags

198b5('bum): par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o//
198b6('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o//
198b7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o//
199a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o//

199a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par nye bar gnas

222a1('bum): par rjes su ma mthong bas/ yongs su 'dzin/ yongs su 'dzin pas nye bar len to// rab 'byor ngas kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs

227b7('bum): tshor ba la mngon par chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
228a1('bum): tshor ba la mngon par chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// sa'i khams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// chu'i khams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs
228a2('bum): su gzung bar bya'o/ / khams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rlung gi khams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// nam mkha'i khams la mngon par
228a3('bum): chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// ma rig pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
228a4('bum): 'du byed la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// dang gzugs la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su
228a5('bum): gzung bar bya'o/ / skye mched drug la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// reg pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// tshor ba la mngon par chags par bya'o//
228a6('bum): yongs su gzung bar bya'o// sred pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// len pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// srid pa la mngon par chags par bya'o//
228a7('bum): yongs su gzung bar bya'o// skye ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rga shi la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
228b1('bum): chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
228b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon
228b3('bum): par chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// phyi nang stong pa
228b4('bum): nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung
228b5('bum): bar bya'o/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par
228b6('bum): chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung
228b7('bum): bar bya'o/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
229a1('bum): par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar
229a2('bum): bya'o/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par
229a3('bum): chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar
229a4('bum): bya'o/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// dbang po rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o//
229a5('bum): yongs su gzung bar bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
229a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// tshad pa rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o//
229a7('bum): yongs su gzung bar bya'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// mthar
229b1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
229b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su
229b3('bum): gzung bar bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa
229b4('bum): bzhi la mngon par chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
229b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
229b6('bum): mngon par chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar
229b7('bum): bya'o/ / rang byang chub la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par
230a1('bum): chags par bya'o/ / yongs su gzung bar bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
230a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la mngon par chags par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na
230a3('bum): spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ba ste/ brtag pa/ brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/
230a4('bum): zhi zhing phra la mkhas pa dang / byang ba dang yid gsal bas 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
230a5('bum): sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
230a6('bum): kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su
230a7('bum): gyur te/ de dag thams cad la ye shes dang spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab rmo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos shing / bsams te gzhal ba dang / brtag pa dang dpyad pa gnyis na/ gang shes rab
230b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos pa de nyid ches legs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems
230b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la
230b3('bum): bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ / brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzad pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgyun tu zhugs
230b4('bum): pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba
230b5('bum): gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ / phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
230b6('bum): chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ / dgra bcom pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i
230b7('bum): bzod par 'dus so/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
231a1('bum): kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam
231a2('bum): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
231a3('bum): chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ / brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par
231a4('bum): 'dus so/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes
231a5('bum): gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni
231a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ / dgra bcom pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
231a7('bum): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par
231b1('bum): 'dus so/ / lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang sus kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas 'dri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni
231b2('bum): myur du 'byung bar shes par bya yi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba/ mdo sde gzhan la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar spyod pa dag ni ma yin no// de
231b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phul du bya ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir
231b4('bum): 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
231b5('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher bstan
231b6('bum): to/ / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das
231b7('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / 'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232a1('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing / dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ brgyad pa rnams
232a2('bum): byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyir 'ong ba rnams byung bar gyur te/
232a3('bum): 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing rang sangs rgyas rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa'
232a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni 'grib pa'am/ 'phel bar yang gda' 'o zhes nas/
232a5('bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
232a6('bum): snga nas dong ste/ de dag shin tu yang ring ba zhig tu phyin nas snang bar gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do// gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni gzugs yod pa'i khams su 'khod
232a7('bum): do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing / gong du
232b1('bum): 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ de gang nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
232b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing zhum par 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par 'gyur la/ rmongs par 'gyur zhing the tsom za/ nem nur byed la/ shes rab
232b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang yid la bya ba de dag dang 'bral bar byed la/ yid la bya ba de dag 'gro'am/ 'ong ngam 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam nyal yang
232b4('bum): rung ste/ rtag tu rgyun 'chad par 'jig par byed cing / chos smra ba'i gang zag de la yang rtag tu rgyun 'chad par 'brang ste/ rab 'byor dper na ba drus ma be'u 'dor ba ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
232b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don du/ nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mngon du ma byas/ dran pas 'dris par ma byas/ yid kyis rtogs par ma byas/ lta bas shin tu khong du chud par ma byas kyi bar du chos smra ba de
232b6('bum): gtong na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni nang nas shi 'phos nas nang du skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu des sngon yang shes rab
232b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par gyur to// gong du yang bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba
233a1('bum): dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par gyur to// bkur sti dang phu dud dang / mchod pa byas par gyur to// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid
233a2('bum): kyis nang nas shi 'phos nas/ nang du skyes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yang thos ma thag tu mos par gyur par blta'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi
233a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la thos ma thag tu mos shing / rmos par gyur nas kyang 'dri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa las yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas
233a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa las shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de lta bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam/ ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/
233a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa las/ de nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos
233a6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri'o// bris nas kyang lung 'bog go/ kha ton byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
233a7('bum): de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so/ / thos nas kyang bzung ngo bcangs so// yongs su bcangs mo// blags so// kun chub par byas so// kha ton du byas so// tshul bzhin du yid la byas so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang
233b1('bum): yid la byed pa de nyid kyis 'dir skyes pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam pa las shi 'phos nas/ nang du skal ba mnyam par skyes na yang de
233b2('bum): ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233b3('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 'dri ba dang / yongs su brtag par byas pas/ de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/
233b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
233b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhu ma par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sdon gyi mthar bsam gtan gyi pha rol
233b6('bum): tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhu ma par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du
233b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
234a1('bum): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhu ma par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bzod pa'i pha
234a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhu ma par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab
234a3('bum): 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/
