238b7('bum): ma byas te/ nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri zhing rtog pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi
239a1('bum): 'am lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'phrogs par 'gyur te/ yongs su dri ba dang yang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/ gang gis
239a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris/ yongs su ma brtags/ rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la de tsam gyi dge ba'i bsam pa dang / mos pa skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni bar
239a3('bum): bar mos shing / bar bar mos pa par 'gyur te/ de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing / shing bal gyi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas/ theg pa
239a4('bum): la zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni shes rab kyi
239a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/ kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
239a6('bum): tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// phyi stong pa
239a7('bum): nyid la ma bslabs so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
239b1('bum): la ma bslabs so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang bzhin stong pa
239b2('bum): nyid la ma bslabs so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// ngo bo nyid stong
239b3('bum): pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
239b4('bum): rnams la ma bslabs so/ / dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so// stobs rnams la ma bslabs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma bslabs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
239b5('bum): la ma bslabs so/ / bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so// tshad pa rnams la ma bslabs so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i
239b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la ma bslabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams la ma bslabs so//
239b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so// 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so// snying
240a1('bum): rje chen po la ma bslabs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// phyir 'ong ba'i
240a2('bum): 'bras bu la ma bslabs so/ / dgra bcom pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang byang chub la ma bslabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems
240a3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/ de ni dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ lung 'bog pa 'am/ kha
240a4('bum): ton bya ba 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar nus so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la
240a5('bum): byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
240a6('bum): rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang /
240a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang
240b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan
240b2('bum): 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs po dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa
240b3('bum): nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang /
240b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
240b5('bum): kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / byang chub
240b6('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan
240b7('bum): rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / tshad pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan
241a1('bum): la phan 'dogs pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pas gzhan la phan
241a2('bum): 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
241a3('bum): pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / 'jigs pa bzhes gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / byams pa chen pos gzhan la phan
241a4('bum): 'dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / lan cig
241a5('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang /
241a6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
241a7('bum): mthun par spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun
241b1('bum): par spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ don
241b2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid
241b3('bum): dang mthun par spyod/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/
241b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
241b5('bum): rnams dang mthun par spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang mthun par spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par spyod/ dbang po rnams dang mthun par mthun par spyod/ stobs rnams dang mthun par spyod/ byang chub kyi
241b6('bum): yan lag rnams dang mthun par spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang mthun par spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dang mthun par spyod/ tshad pa rnams dang
241b7('bum): mthun par mi spyod/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang mthun par spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthun par spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par spyod/ rnam par
242a1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mthun par spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo
242a2('bum): rnams dang mthun par spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par spyod/ 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun par spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par spyod/ snying rje chen po dang mthun par
242a3('bum): spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang mthun par spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun par spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par spyod/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun
242a4('bum): par spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ rang byang chub dang mthun par spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang mthun par spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par spyod na/ de ni
242a5('bum): gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
242a6('bum): sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris ma bstan/ kha ton du ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang pha rol la phan ma btags/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
242a7('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mthun par ma spyod pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po de
242b1('bum): las gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu bzhi'o// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru
242b2('bum): zhig la rnams shing ngam/ shing dum mam/ shing leb bam/ rkyal pa'am/ ro la 'ju 'dzin na/ rab 'byor de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
242b3('bum): gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe/ shing ngam shing dum mam/ shing leb bam/ rkyal pa 'am/ ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam nyes par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol
242b4('bum): gyi 'gram du phyin par 'gyur te/ ma nyes mnyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang dga' bcom dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan
242b5('bum): pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri ston kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed
242b6('bum): cing rten pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la
242b7('bum): byed cing rten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rten pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed tshul
243a1('bum): bzhin du yid la byed cing mi rten pa dang / nang stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du
243a2('bum): yid la byed cing rten pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la
243a3('bum): byed cing rten pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing
243a4('bum): rten pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang
243a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing
243a6('bum): rten pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa
243a7('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa
243b1('bum): dang / pa stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing rten pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rten pa dang /
243b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rten pa dang /
243b3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang /
243b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / dbang po rnams 'dri ston kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / stobs rnams 'dri
243b5('bum): ston kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
243b6('bum): 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams
243b7('bum): 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / tshad pa rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par
244a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / mthar
244a2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'dri ston/ kha ton du
244a3('bum): byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rten pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul
244a4('bum): bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du
244a5('bum): yid la byed cing rten pa dang / 'jigs pa bzhi 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing
244a6('bum): rten pa dang / byams pa chen po 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rten pa dang / snying rje chen po 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / sangs
244a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rten pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang /
244b1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dri ston/ kha ton du byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rten pa de dag ni bar ma
244b2('bum): dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na pa yang dag
244b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du dad pa yod cing / bzod pa dang mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / gtong ba yod cing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de dag ni shes
244b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/ / lung 'bog go/ kha ton byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// rten par byed do// de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
244b5('bum): dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ mos pa yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ spro ba yod/ gtong ba yod/ brtson 'grus 'dor ba yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/
244b6('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims
244b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs
245a1('bum): su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
245a2('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
245a3('bum): dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
245a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran
245a5('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / byang
245a6('bum): chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad pas
245a7('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang /
245b1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung ba
245b2('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / 'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos
245b3('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
245b4('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ bar ma dor nye zho par nyan thos kyis las 'das/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das te/ sems can yongs su smyin par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ bla na pa
245b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bud dam skyes pa la la zhig gis bum pa ma bsregs shing / so ma btang bas chu bcu bar sems na/ rab
245b6('bum): 'byor bum pa de ni ring por gnas te/ myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te/ de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
245b7('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la'ang / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam
246a1('bum): pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus 'dor ba yang yod mod/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su
246a2('bum): ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin
246a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po

251a5('bum): shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta
251a6('bum): ste/ dper na/ na tshod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/ rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa/ 'khobs pa zhig yod la/ de'i lus la rlung ngam/ mkhris pa'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/
251a7('bum): de gcig pu nyam rangs su khri las ldang nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni khri las ldang nus su lags kyang / rgyang grags gcig gam/ rgyang grags gnyis su yang mchi
251b1('bum): bar nus te/ de rgas pa dang / bro 'tshal bas nyams dmas pa'i slad du/ khri las ldang nus su lags kyang mchi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
251b2('bum): bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus 'dor ba
251b3('bum): yang yod mod/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
251b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
251b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
251b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang
251b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po pa stong pa
252a1('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong
252a2('bum): ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags
252a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs pa'i snyoms
252a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
252a5('bum): pa dang / smon pa pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
252a6('bum): stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / 'jigs pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas
252a7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/
252b1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas
252b2('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi
252b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis

252b6('bum): ba pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba
252b7('bum): dang / pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
253a1('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /

253a6('bum): bzung ba dang / 'jigs pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhes yongs su ma bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
253a7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
253b1('bum): ba'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ na tshod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/ rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa/ 'khobs pa de nyid/ rlung ngam/ mkhris pa'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur la/ de khri las ldang bar 'dod
253b2('bum): na/ de la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis glo g.yas g.yon nas bzung ste/ brten nas 'di skad du kye skyes bu khyod ci dga' ba'i don du gar 'dod par 'dong ngo // khyod ni bdag cag gis bzung gis gnas der ma phyin gyi bar du lam du bar ma
253b3('bum): dor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bsgo ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lo bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos
253b4('bum): pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus 'dor ba yang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas
253b5('bum): yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
253b6('bum): bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /

254a1('bum): yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
254a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
254a3('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung /

254a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams
254a7('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / 'jigs pa bzhes yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su
254b1('bum): bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs
254b2('bum): su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na
254b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang zag
254b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
254b5('bum): khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ / legs so// rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs
254b6('bum): su gtong na/ de bdag dang bdag gir lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab
254b7('bum): sgom na/ de yang bdag dang bdag gir lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems te bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni sbyin pa
255a1('bum): byed pa'o/ / bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan no// bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni
255a2('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo// bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go// bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o//
255a3('bum): bdag ni shes rab bsgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul
255a4('bum): khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang
255a5('bum): ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan
255a6('bum): gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe
255a7('bum): na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag de/ ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtag pa de dag de/ ring du song ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha
255b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag de/ ring du song ba ni bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtag pa de dag de/ ring du song ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
255b2('bum): rtog pa de dag de/ ring du song ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag de/ ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de lta yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de
255b3('bum): ring du song ba yang shes/ pha rol yang shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha
255b4('bum): rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
255b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
255b6('bum): yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba pa stong pa
255b7('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / pa stong pa nyid kyis
256a1('bum): yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

256a4('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /
