330a6('bum): 'da'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang
330a7('bum): tshul de las 'da'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la su zhig
330b1('bum): mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par
330b2('bum): gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyin pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
330b3('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshul dang
330b4('bum): mtshan ma dang / rnam pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu drug go// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
330b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ 'dod chags rnam par bstsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
330b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par bstsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i
330b7('bum): rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ zhe sdang dang gti mug gi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
331a1('bum): dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro//
331a2('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags pa'i rnam pas/ dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
331a3('bum): po de dag ni zhe sdang dang zhe sdang pa dang gti mug dang gti mug pa'i rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
331a4('bum): mo 'di yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su
331a5('bum): shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ sems
331a6('bum): can rnams kyi rten du gyur pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can
331a7('bum): ni/ sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal kyang de
331b1('bum): la sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis
331b2('bum): sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go ca 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
331b3('bum): rab 'byor gzugs kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni tshor ba dang 'brel pa
331b4('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshor ba yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
331b5('bum): go ca de ni 'du shes dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'du shes kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni 'du shes dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang
331b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'du byed dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'du byed kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'du byed dang 'brel pa
331b7('bum): ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/
332a1('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni/ rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mig dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor kyang shin tu la/ byang chub
332a2('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rna ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rna ba yang shin tu la/
332a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rna ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sna dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sna yang shin tu la/
332a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sna dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lce dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lce yang shin tu
332a5('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lce dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lus dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lus
332a6('bum): kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lus dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
332a7('bum): rab 'byor yid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni yid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de
332b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sgra dang 'brel pa
332b2('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgra yang shin tu la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sgra dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dri dang 'brel
332b3('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dri yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni dri dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
332b4('bum): de ni ro dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ro yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ro dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
332b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni reg dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor reg kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni reg dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang

337b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i
337b6('bum): phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes
337b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
338a1('bum): de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
338a2('bum): bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyi stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir
338a3('bum): go cha de ni phyi stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/
338a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
338a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
338a6('bum): go cha de ni chen po stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni chen po stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab
338a7('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go
338b1('bum): cha de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/
338b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
338b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
338b4('bum): po'i go cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong
338b5('bum): pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu
338b6('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang
338b7('bum): 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang
339a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir
339a2('bum): go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
339a3('bum): shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel
339a4('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go che de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
339a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni pa
339a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/
339a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
339b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go
339b2('bum): cha de ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po
339b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
339b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar
339b5('bum): gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shin tu la/
339b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
339b7('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
340a1('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin
340a2('bum): zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i
340a3('bum): phyir go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
340a4('bum): kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
340a5('bum): lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang
340a6('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang
340a7('bum): chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
340b1('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/
340b2('bum): tshad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshad pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni tshad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
340b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang
340b4('bum): pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
340b5('bum): 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mthar
340b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthar
340b7('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang 'brel pa ma yin
341a1('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo
341a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par
341a3('bum): shes pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa
341a4('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
341a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin
341a6('bum): zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub
341a7('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
341b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go
341b2('bum): cha de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa
341b3('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
341b4('bum): go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
341b5('bum): snying rje chen po yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang
341b6('bum): 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//
341b7('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i
342a1('bum): phyir go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
342a2('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
342a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni phyir
342a4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu la
342a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
342a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lam gyi
342a7('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin
342b1('bum): zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu la/ byang chub
342b2('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag
342b3('bum): gis/ sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/ go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
342b4('bum): sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/ go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
342b5('bum): bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang
342b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go che 'tshal ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems
342b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
343a1('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos des sems can nyi tse nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes nyung zad nyi tse zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
343a2('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
343a3('bum): slad du go cha 'tshal to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes nyung zad
343a4('bum): nyi tse'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so// gsol pa/ bcom
343a5('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par bgyi/ ci yang bsgom par bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
343a6('bum): zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nam mkha' bsgom
343a7('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
343b1('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
343b2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom
343b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
343b4('bum): 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
343b5('bum): pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
343b6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
343b7('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
344a1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
344a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
344a3('bum): pa 'di ni/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
344a4('bum): chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
344a5('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
344a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
344a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa
344b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
344b2('bum): ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
344b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
344b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
344b5('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
344b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
344b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
345a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
345a2('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
345a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
345a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
345a5('bum): 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
345a6('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
345a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
345b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
345b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
345b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
345b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
345b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
345b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
345b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
346a1('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
346a2('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par
346a3('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
346a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
346a5('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
346a6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
346a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
346b1('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
346b2('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ don
346b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
346b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
346b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba
346b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
346b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
347a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
347a2('bum): ni/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
347a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par
347a4('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
347a5('bum): rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
347a6('bum): pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
347a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par
347b1('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad pa
347b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
347b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par
347b4('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
347b5('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
347b6('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom po rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin
347b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
348a1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
348a2('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
348a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
348a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par
348a5('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang
348a6('bum): chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
348a7('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
348b1('bum): 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par ba sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
348b2('bum): 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par ba sgom pa'o// rab 'byar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par ba sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
348b3('bum): rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba
348b4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
348b5('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
348b6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
348b7('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
349a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
349a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
349a3('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
349a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
349a5('bum): 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
349a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
349a7('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
349b1('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gi 'dus te reg
349b2('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
349b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
349b4('bum): tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
349b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
349b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ khams bsgom pa rnam par
349b7('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams
350a1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
350a2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
350a3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
350a4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
350a5('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
350a6('bum): len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam
350a7('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
350b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
350b2('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
350b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
350b4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
350b5('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
350b6('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
350b7('bum): pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
351a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam
351a2('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
351a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
351a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
351a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
351a6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa
351a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha'
351b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
351b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
351b3('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
351b4('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po pa
351b5('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
351b6('bum): pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
351b7('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
352a1('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa
352a2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
352a3('bum): brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
352a4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
352a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
352a6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
352a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par
352b1('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom
352b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
352b3('bum): 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
352b4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
352b5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
352b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa
352b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub
353a1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
353a2('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
353a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab
353a4('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab
353a5('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa dam zhes brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab
353a6('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa dam zhes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub
353a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa dam zhes tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems
353b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa dam zhes sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
353b2('bum): dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par
353b3('bum): chags pa dam zhes phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes phyi nang stong pa
353b4('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
353b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
353b6('bum): bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang
353b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
354a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems
354a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
354a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang
354a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
354a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
354a6('bum): po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang
354a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa
354b1('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
354b2('bum): mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa
354b3('bum): dam zhes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/
354b4('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/
354b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la/ mngon par chags pa med dam zhes yang dag
354b6('bum): par spong ba rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la/ mngon par chags pa dam zhes rdzu 'phrul gyi
354b7('bum): rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dbang po rnams la byang chub sems
355a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems
355a2('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems
355a3('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la byang chub
355a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems
355a5('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag
355a6('bum): par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes tshad pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
355a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
355b1('bum): bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang
355b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag
355b3('bum): par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la mngon par chags pa dam zhes rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
355b4('bum): smon pa pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes mngon par shes pa rnams la/
355b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems
355b6('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
355b7('bum): brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
356a1('bum): su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
356a2('bum): brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
356a3('bum): brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes byams pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang
356a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa dam zhes snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
356a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa dam zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
356a6('bum): chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lam
356a7('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam/ zhes lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa
356b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags pa dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
356b2('bum): brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol
356b3('bum): gyis bstan pa la snying por lta'am/ phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas 'gro'am/ phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems
356b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/
356b5('bum): gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar
356b6('bum): ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar
356b7('bum): ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/
357a1('bum): 'jigs sngang skrag par 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin
357a2('bum): cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
357a3('bum): yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
357a4('bum): chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ 'jigs mi sngang skrag par 'gyur la/ zhum par 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir ldog la/ thos nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/
357a5('bum): klog cing kun chu ba par byed pa de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'jigs sngang
357a6('bum): skrag par 'gyur zhing / zhum par 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
357a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
357b1('bum): 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la
357b2('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
357b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i
357b4('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor skye ba pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
357b5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor 'gag pa pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa
357b6('bum): pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
357b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor chos
358a1('bum): kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
358a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
358a3('bum): yin/ rab 'byor bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba pa la gzhol ba'i
358a4('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
358a5('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
358a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smyig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
358a7('bum): rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
358b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
358b2('bum): la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
