358b4('bum): ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
358b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
358b6('bum): par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
358b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa
359a1('bum): nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
359a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
359a3('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
359a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smyig rgyu la
359a5('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
359a6('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs
359a7('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna la rtog pa lags
359b1('bum): sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags
359b2('bum): sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/
359b3('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa
359b4('bum): lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i
359b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa
359b6('bum): lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/
359b7('bum): nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ dang gzugs la rtog pa
360a1('bum): lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/ len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/
360a2('bum): skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus
360a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/

360a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

365a6('bum): do/ / tshad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i
365a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
365b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do/ / ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'jigs pa nyid
365b2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byams pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
365b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
365b4('bum): nyid gcig pa'o/ / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
365b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
365b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid
365b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
366a1('bum): pa'o/ / lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
366a2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
366a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang
366a4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
366a5('bum): reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
366a6('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
366a7('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
366b1('bum): pa'o/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
366b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
366b3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
366b4('bum): gcig pa'o/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
366b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus
366b6('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
366b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus
367a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
367a2('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
367a3('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
367a4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
367a5('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
367a6('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
367a7('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
367b1('bum): 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
367b2('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
367b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor
367b4('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
367b5('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
367b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang
367b7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
368a1('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
368a2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
368a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
368a4('bum): phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
368a5('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
368a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
368a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
368b1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
368b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
368b3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dor ba
368b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
368b5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid
368b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
368b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa
369a1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
369a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
369a3('bum): pa'o/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
369a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
369a5('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
369a6('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
369a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
369b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs pa'i
369b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
369b3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
369b4('bum): pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa
369b5('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
369b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
369b7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'jigs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
370a1('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
370a2('bum): gcig pa'o/ / byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
370a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
370a4('bum): pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu bdun no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu lnga pa// de nas
370a5('bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pal dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
370a6('bum): logs su 'thor bar gyur to/ / gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod
370a7('bum): pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
370b1('bum): las 'di skad du/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa
370b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
370b3('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang go/ rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
370b4('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'o/ / sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
370b5('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
370b6('bum): kyang gzugs so/ / sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
370b7('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so//
371a1('bum): gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
371a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
371a3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa
371a4('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gi 'dus te reg pa'o//
371a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i
371a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
371a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid
371b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
371b2('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus
371b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
371b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
371b5('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ / sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
371b6('bum): chu'i khams so/ / khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung
371b7('bum): gi khams so/ / nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
372a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ / ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
372a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
372a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dang gzugs so/ / skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
372a4('bum): kyang reg pa'o/ / tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa
372a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
372a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ / rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol
372a7('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
372b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
372b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
372b3('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ / nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang
372b4('bum): stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po
372b5('bum): stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus
372b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa
372b7('bum): nyid do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
373a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam
373a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan
373a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang pa
373a4('bum): stong pa nyid do/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
373a5('bum): kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
373a6('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid
373a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa
373b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i
373b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
373b3('bum): pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ / bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
373b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad pa rnams so/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par
373b5('bum): thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
373b6('bum): kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar
373b7('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shis pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams
374a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin
374a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
374a3('bum): kyang 'jigs pa rnams so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
374a4('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
374a5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
374a6('bum): gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// 'du shes
374a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
374b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
374b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su
374b3('bum): byar do/ / rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
374b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
374b5('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
374b6('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do/ / yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
374b7('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
375a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
375a2('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// reg
375a3('bum): gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
375a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
375a5('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
375a6('bum): ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do//
375a7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
375b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
375b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
375b3('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
375b4('bum): gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar
375b5('bum): do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin
375b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
375b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
376a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
376a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
376a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
376a4('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
376a5('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
376a6('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar
376a7('bum): do/ / chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
376b1('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
376b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
376b3('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
376b4('bum): cing gnyis su byar do/ / ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid
376b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
376b6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
376b7('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su
377a1('bum): byar do/ / reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang
377a2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
377a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
377a4('bum): cing gnyis su byar do/ / srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
377a5('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
377a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
377a7('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
377b1('bum): su cing gnyis su byar do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar med do//
377b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
377b3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
377b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
377b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid
377b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
377b7('bum): su cing gnyis su byar do/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// chen po
378a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
378a2('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
378a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
378a4('bum): gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do//
378a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
378a6('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
378a7('bum): gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
378b1('bum): do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
378b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
378b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
378b4('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing
378b5('bum): gnyis su byar do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// yang dag par
378b6('bum): spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

379a1('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/

379a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
379a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa

379a6('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
379a7('bum): ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do//
379b1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rnam par thar
379b2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do//
379b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin
379b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams

379b6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
379b7('bum): gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do/
380a1('bum): byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
380a2('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
380a3('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
380a4('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing
380a5('bum): gnyis su byar do/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// dgra bcom pa
380a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
380a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
380b1('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
380b2('bum): su cing gnyis su byar do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar
380b3('bum): do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
380b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
380b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
380b6('bum): gcig pa ste gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do/ / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su cing gnyis su byar do//
380b7('bum): zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba
381a1('bum): zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di
381a2('bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
381a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
381a4('bum): nyid kyang 'du byed do/ / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang go/
381a5('bum): rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
381a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o/ / lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs
381a7('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
381b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o/ / ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam
381b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par
381b3('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes
381b4('bum): pa'o/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
381b5('bum): nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
381b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams
381b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
382a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// gi 'dus te reg
382a2('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
382a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o//
382a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
382a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
382a6('bum): ba'o/ / sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// khams nyid rnam
382a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
382b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
382b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ / 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
382b3('bum): pa'o/ / dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid
382b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
382b5('bum): pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ / len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad
382b6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
382b7('bum): pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
383a1('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
383a2('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid
383a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
383a4('bum): pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam
383a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa
383a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
383a7('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
383b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
383b2('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
383b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po
383b4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//
383b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
383b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
383b7('bum): kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan
384a1('bum): rnams so/ / tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
384a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams so/ / rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
384a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams so/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smyon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams
384a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
384a5('bum): nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
384a6('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa
384a7('bum): chen po'o/ / snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// //
